00045 namespace IsoEx {
00046 
00047 
00048 //== CLASS DEFINITION =========================================================
00049 
00050 
00051 template <class Mesh>
00052 class ImplicitMesh : public Implicit
00053 {
00054 public:
00055    
00057   ImplicitMesh(const Mesh& _mesh);
00059   ~ImplicitMesh() {}
00060 
00061 
00062   float scalar_distance(const OpenMesh::Vec3f& _point) const;
00063 
00064   bool is_inside(const OpenMesh::Vec3f& _point) const 
00065   { return scalar_distance(_point) < 0.0; }
00066 
00067   bool directed_distance(const OpenMesh::Vec3f&  _p0,
00068                          const OpenMesh::Vec3f&  _p1,
00069                          OpenMesh::Vec3f&        _point,
00070                          OpenMesh::Vec3f&        _normal,
00071                          float&                  _distance) const
00072   { return false; }
00073 
00074   
00075 private:
00076 
00077   const Mesh& mesh_;
00078   typedef OpenMeshTriangleBSPT<Mesh> BSP;
00079   BSP  bsp_;
00080 };
